text: The 2019 Annual D.I.C.E. Awards is the 22nd edition of the D.I.C.E. Awards, an annual awards event that honors the best games in the video game industry. The awards are arranged by the Academy of Interactive Arts & Sciences (AIAS), and held at the Aria Convention Center in Las Vegas, Nevada. Winners of the D.I.C.E. Awards are determined by ballot of industry experts and AIAS members. "D.I.C.E." is a backronym for "Design Innovate Communicate Entertain". It was hosted by Greg Miller and Jessica Chobot.
